name: df-bnj14
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(c-bnj14(c0, c1, c2), crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0)))
comment: Define the function giving: the class of all elements of ` A ` that are "smaller" than ` X ` according to ` R ` . (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
